@rasin_simon @ilpomodoro2 He's mad that Biden is reassuring the American people during a crisis. Will is a relentless fault-finder who is never satisfied with anything any elected Democrat does. Democrats not doing enough/doing the wrong thing is in fact the *only* thing he talks about most days.
